cab.content: /T. RAILY/AYMBN* S STRIKE .BOAED Off TRADE .1*7 JeojfBulletin No.9. Friday 27th Sept.1918,. 5 p. m.The Railway "Executive Committee report this afternoon that the whole of the Railways are now practically clear with the exception of the London & Sout Western, on which about 1,000 men are still out at Eaatleigh and Nine Sims, London. , The Nine Elms men have passed a resolution in favour of returning to work and are reported to be now returning.
